local_intent: Align to bread with 225° yaw and push it 0.2 m toward the plate, then verify visibility and retreat.
assumptions: Bread and plate are within view; push path is unobstructed.
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan: perception with Detect/Scan fallback, set yaw 225°, tight ApproachAndAlign, Push 0.2 at 225°, re-detect bread, then Retreat.
